mapper.select: select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_reg_date as noticeRegDate, notice_state as noticeState from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select * from notice_tbl where notice_state='정상' and notice_type='부동산' order by rownum desc) n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from notice_tbl where notice_type='부동산'

insert.if: insert into notice_tbl values (notice_index.nextval, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriter}, null, null, sysdate, #{noticeState})
insert into notice_tbl values (notice_index.nextval, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeFilename}, null, sysdate, #{noticeState})

mapper.select: select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_filename as noticeFilename, notice_filepath as noticeFilepath, notice_content as noticeContent from notice_tbl where notice_index=#{noticeIndex}
mapper.update: update notice_tbl set notice_state='삭제' where notice_index=#{notice_index}
mapper.select: select faq_index as faqIndex, faq_user_type as faqUserType, faq_question as faqQuestion, faq_state as faqState, faq_answer as faqAnswer, faq_reg_date as faqRegDate from (select rownum as rnum, f.* from (select * from faq_tbl where faq_user_type='부동산' and faq_state='정상' order by rownum desc) f) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from faq_tbl where faq_user_type='부동산'

select questions_index as questionsIndex, questions_user_type as questionsUserType, questions_title as questionsTitle, questions_answer as questionsAnswer, questions_answer_state as questionsAnswerState, questions_writer as questionsWriter, questions_reg_date as questionsRegDate, questions_state as questionsState from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select * from questions_tbl where questions_state='정상' and questions_user_type='부동산' order by rownum desc) n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from questions_tbl where questions_user_type='부동산'

select questions_index as questionsIndex, questions_title as questionsTitle, questions_writer as questionsWriter, questions_content as questionsContent, questions_answer as questionsAnswer from questions_tbl where questions_index=#{questionsIndex}
